name: Helio Protocol
intro: Open-source liquidity protocol for borrowing and earning yield
introduce: Helio Protocol is an open-source liquidity protocol for borrowing and earning yield on HAY - a new BNB backed, over-collateralized and an entirely new asset class in crypto called “destablecoins”(in which “de” stands for decentralized) . Built on the BNB Chain, Helio Protocol consists of a dual token model and mechanisms that support instant conversions, asset collateralization, borrowing, yield farming, and staking.
